name: Sweet Candy Ice Land
description:
Sweet Candy Ice Land is a free cool match-3 game!
This game is very popular with women, children and the elderly.
Also many handsome boy and beauty girl love it very much!
Features:
-Good art,good music,good animation effects.
-Variety of delicious candy, bread, ice cream, cheese.
-Use props to eliminate ice, monsters and obstacles.
-Highly exploratory level design.
-Play anywhere and anytime.
